Uses of Interface
jam.plot.PlotMouseListener

Packages that use PlotMouseListener
jam.fit Contains classes for parametric fitting of 1-dimensional histograms. 
jam.plot Classes for controlling the representation of the plots portion of Jam's display. 
 

Uses of PlotMouseListener in jam.fit
 

Classes in jam.fit that implement PlotMouseListener
 class CalibFit
          Makes a linear fit to a number of points
 class Fit
          This defines the necessary methods that need to be defined in order for a fit routine to work with FitControl.
 class GaussianFit
          This abstract class uses NonLinearFit to fit a single gaussian peak with a background..
 class MultipleGaussians
          This abstract class uses NonLinearFit to fit a single gaussian peak with a background..
 class NonLinearFit
          This abstract class uses LevenbergMarquadt to do non-linear parametric function fitting.
 class PeakIntensity
          Takes 4 channels as input...limits of background, and limits of peak.
 

Uses of PlotMouseListener in jam.plot
 

Classes in jam.plot that implement PlotMouseListener
 class Action
          Class the does the actions on plots.
 

Methods in jam.plot with parameters of type PlotMouseListener
 void PlotMouse.addListener(PlotMouseListener listener)
          Add a class, a listener, that will be called if a PlotMouse event occurs.
 boolean PlotMouse.removeListener(PlotMouseListener listener)
          Remove a class that was called if a PlotMouse event occured.
 void Plot.addPlotMouseListener(PlotMouseListener listener)
          add a mouselistener that outputs channel
 void Plot.removePlotMouseListener(PlotMouseListener listener)
          remove mouselistener that outputs channel FIXME return type
 void Display.addPlotMouseListener(PlotMouseListener listener)
          Adds a plot mouse listner, plot mouse is a mouse which is calibrated to the current display.
 void Display.removePlotMouseListener(PlotMouseListener listener)
          Removes a plot mouse.
